page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE 5
page.content: After that it was dinner time, and my packed lunch was lovely. After dinner it was group English, and we had to do a book reveiw, so I did 'Vlad the Drac'. At playtime we played rounders, which we won 8-7, and after play we had free choice, so I drew a picture of Donald Duck and Mickey Mouse. At home time I went for tea at Julies house, and we had chips, beefburgers and beans, which was gorgeous. After our tea we went onto the school field and played football, but at 8.30 we had to go in. When I got in I watched 'Family Fortunes' on T.V. After that I did some ironing, and then after the 10.00 O'clock news I went to bed By Sarah Middleton (aged 11).
